lead_paragraph: A federal judge quashed the efforts of lawyers for the defendants to obtain the phone, which they believe might contain clues about the involvement of others in the scheme.

headline.print_headline: Christie’s Phone, a Missing Piece in the Bridge Case, Is Found
headline.main: Christie’s Phone, a Missing Piece in the Bridge Case, Is Found

snippet: A federal judge quashed the efforts of lawyers for the defendants to obtain the phone, which they believe might contain clues about the involvement of others in the scheme....
abstract: Spokesman for New Jersey Gov Chris Christie reveals whereabouts of Christie’s cell phone after judge denies request to obtain it by lawyer defending Bill Baroni in George Washington Bridge lane closure scandal; defense believes phone, location of which had been mystery, may contain clues about others involved in scheme.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
